title: Drewplicate (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Drewplicate (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Adam and Dr. Drew open the show with Drew observing for the first time ever the disproportionate amount of their time that they, and Adam especially, spend in the studio. The guys then welcome in friend of the show Jordan Harbinger and they launch into a discussion about cognitive dissonance and how it is expanding into the general American culture. Adam also shares some thoughts on comments made recently by Mindy Kaling before the guys turn to the phones and speak to callers on a variety of topics.
